3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Nathaniel Reinke - 415-710-7284 - Charming 3 Bedroom Home with Separate ADU in Oakland's Laurel District.  Welcome to this delightful property nestled in the heart of Oakland's sought-after Laurel District. This charming residence offers a unique blend of modern comfort and classic appeal, featuring a main house with 3 bedrooms and 1.5 bathrooms, complemented by a separate Accessory Dwelling Unit (ADU), perfect for extended family living, rental income, or a home office space.  Step inside the main house and be greeted by a warm and inviting atmosphere. A beautifully updated full bathroom and a convenient half bath complete the main house's interior, offering modern amenities and style.CALL FOR OFFERS Tuesday 3/26 at noon.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Linnette Edwards - Agt: 925-580-8801 - Welcome to 4508 Fair Ave, a stunning 3-bedroom, 1.5-bathroom home located in the highly desirable Redwood Heights with amazing gardens! With 1,475 square feet of living space, this home offers a perfect blend of comfort, style, and functionality.As you step inside, you'll immediately notice the bright and spacious living room, featuring large windows that let in an abundance of natural light and offer stunning views of the San Francisco Bay, the Bay Bridge, and the city skyline. The updated kitchen is a chef's dream, with stainless steel appliances, sleek countertops, and plenty of cabinet space for all your cooking needs. The bedrooms are generously sized and provide ample room for rest and relaxation, while the updated bathrooms feature modern fixtures and finishes that add to the overall elegance of the home.But the true highlight of this property is its outdoor space. The backyard is beautifully landscaped with a variety of fruit trees and vegetable plants, providing a unique opportunity for urban agriculture and sustainable living. Imagine picking fresh oranges, lemons, figs, or harvesting your own vegetables for a farm-to-table meal, all within the comfort of your own backyard.

Remarks: Nathan Jines - 510-220-4714 - Perched on a hill at the end of a cul-de-sac with panoramic SF bay views, this charming 3 bed, 2 bath home in the sought-after Redwood Heights neighborhood has it all! With 1,767 sq ft of living space on a 6,250 sq ft lot, it features landscaped gardens, a grassy play yard, and an expansive back patio—an entertainer's paradise! Upon entering, you'll be captivated by the stunning views from many windows, including those in the kitchen, living room, and dining area. The spacious kitchen is a chef’s dream, equipped with high-end appliances and beautiful hardwood floors. The upstairs bathroom has been fully remodeled with dual sinks, separate tub, and tiled shower enclosure. The downstairs area can function as an in-law unit, complete with its own bedroom and bathroom, providing flexibility and added convenience. A massive storage space with 10+ ft ceilings under the house offers potential for future expansion. Step outside to the inviting patio in the backyard, surrounded by meticulously landscaped grounds. This area is perfect for relaxation and entertainment, offering plenty of space for gardening and a grassy play area. Convenience is at your fingertips with proximity to restaurants, parks, shopping, easy access to Hwy 580 and 13, and minutes from East Bay trails.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Dana S. Cohen - 510-813-0321 - Perched above a serene one-block lane in scenic Redwood Heights is this gracious Traditional with charming period finishes intertwined with stylish contemporary updates. This split-level home features a floorplan that will suit a variety of lifestyles and will inspire you to stay home and nest, but don’t wait too long to check out the Redwood Heights Elementary school playground, the local community center and Peet’s coffee that are all just blocks away. If the warm weather holds, start enjoying spectacular autumn sunsets from your front yard or move to the level backyard with plenty of space for outdoor play and entertaining under the stars. A flagstone pathway guides you through beautiful gardens to a welcoming front porch with a peek of the Bay. To the left of the foyer is the airy living room with vaulted ceiling and center fireplace. To the right is the dining room, use as a casual dining space or to host a holiday feast. The generous eat-in kitchen features recently installed quartz countertops, tile backsplash and several new stainless appliances. Both full baths are refreshed. Downstairs a half bath, laundry, family room & a spacious flex room, perhaps your new home office. The backyard with level space has a gated entry. Imagine a sports court, tiki bar, or lawn & patio.
Confidential Remarks: To show, call/text Dana for alarm code. Open Sunday 11/19 from 1:30-4. Neither the Seller nor Listing Agent have verified or guaranteed the square footage of the home or lot.  Prelim. with Old Republic Title - Prelim #1116040126. Escrow officer Ina Dunlap in Montclair office.
Directions to Property: Redwood Rd to Monterey or Aliso to 39th to Selkirk

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Deidre Joyner - Cell: 510-693-4253 - 4254 Gregory Street is a Mid-century traditional home in the heart of Redwood Heights. The sunny front yard offers an organic array of blooms and shrubs, anchored by a sculptural olive tree. The level-in main living space has an extra large updated eat-in kitchen with convenient access to the garage with interior access. The living room is one with the dining room with modernist touches such as a stacked brick corner fireplace, floor-to-ceiling windows, and French doors out to a covered patio and sunny deck. Your relaxation in the living-dining room is enhanced by the views of the chartreuse-colored Japanese maple tree that was recently groomed by a licensed arborist. There are 2 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms on the main level, one of them being a very generous-sized primary suite with an updated bathroom. The solid oak floors were just refinished, the majority of the walls were freshly painted, and many new Mid-century inspired made-to-order in the USA solid brass light fixtures (all 2024) were installed. Downstairs is a den and 3rd bedroom with a bathroom and French doors out to the lower backyard providing great indoor-outdoor flow from both levels of the home. This home has effortless style, views of the hills, large rooms, and is ready for you to make new memories.
Confidential Remarks: The alarm is NOT on. Pre Escrow with Chicago Title Montclair. Offers Thursday 5/22 by 1 pm.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Holly Sibley - Agt: 925-451-3105 - This is a great opportunity located in the Redwood Heights Neighborhood! You cannot beat the amazing views looking upon all of the San Francisco Bay! Enjoy views of the Golden Gate Bridge, Downtown San Francisco and the picture perfect sunsets from each room of this charming home that was built in 1924. So much character! This 2 story home offers a ton of potential with some little TLC. As you step in off the front porch, you will see the original hardwood floors throughout the family room, dining area and bedrooms. Public Remarks: On a small street at the top of Redwood Heights, tucked against the trees, lies this home of exceptional serenity. 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms and a 6,030 square foot lot are the facts. But what is special here lies beyond that. It’s morning coffee in front of the kitchen window, watching the birds start the day. Finding peace in your garden planting vegetables or harvesting fruit from your fruit trees. Napping under your magnolia within the scent of roses adorning your back deck. Entertaining or just getting cozy in your large den. This is a home that feels like home, a place of refuge, style, and life.
Showing Instruction: Call or text agent to show prior to 3/28. Go & Show after.

The adjacent gourmet kitchen has abundant storage, stone counters, stainless steel appliances, and perfectly placed office desk area. Two generous sized bedrooms with sizable closet space, updated bath and level out spacious tile back patio with lush plantings. Sought-after combination of modern living, views, and convenience to the best of the bay area. Easy access to freeways!

Confidential Remarks: Thank you for showing. Please text Rehana for showing instructions/CBS entry code. 650-868-5080
Public Remarks: Located in one of Northern Californias most sought-after communities and strategically positioned to take full advantage of the spectacular San Francisco Bay views, 4630 Kaphan is an incredible new offering in the highly regarded Redwood Heights neighborhood. Simply magnificent, the Kaphan home offers nearly 1480 square feet of thoughtfully integrated living space in a quiet, peaceful setting. Offering multiple contemporary upgrades, walls of glass, romantic views, a stunning gourmet kitchen (boasting commercial grade appliances, stone counters and custom cabinets), a traditional formal living room (with fireplace) and three graciously proportioned bedrooms (including the primary suite hideaway with a spa-like ensuite bathroom). The rear yard is a dream - with ample space for the gardening enthusiast, outdoor entertainment and more. The location is in a word - exceptional. Oakland offers a rich culture for music, entertainment, international foods, outdoor activities (hiking and regional parks), shopping, and local community activities. Additionally, both the High-Tech and the Bio-Tech communities are just an easy commute away. It's time to embrace your new lifestyle. Get ready for tranquil, serene and low maintenance weekends that truly embody the phrase vacation at home.

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Sheril D Madden - Agt: 510-501-1317 - Built by O. W. Johnson in 1961, this classic, tastefully updated two-plus bedroom, three-bath, privately-sited contemporary is infused with a mid-century flair. The living room, dining room and kitchen are light-filled and open, and feature vaulted, beamed ceilings and wonderful indoor/outdoor access.  Sited high up on Maybelle, at the end of a long driveway, one feels a sense of tranquility, almost a country-like feeling upon arriving. The distance from the street coupled with the breathtaking and expansive views, both of the bay, and the large deep lots on this portion of the street, provides instant serenity. No need to worry, however, as two shopping areas are close by. One can go up the hill to the Lincoln Square Shopping Center (1.3 miles) or down the hill to the Laurel shopping district (0.5 miles). This special home offers the best of both worlds, a tranquil oasis with urban amenities close by. Some of the home's special features include a primary bedroom with a spa-like en suite bath and private patio area, an attached, oversized 2 car garage w/ interior access and a  lower level family room with 8'2 ceilings. This room, with an adjoining bath could also be a guest suite, a home office or a 3rd bedroom. Many newer systems.
Confidential Remarks: Alarm is OFF during the day. Please be sure to look for the arrow with 4129 Maybelle on it, attached to the fence, and head down the driveway. 4129 Maybelle is tucked away at the end of a long driveway. You are welcome to park in the driveway. Open Sat and Sun 7/22 and 7/23, 2-4, and Monday 7/17, 10-1. Offers Tuesday 7/25 by noon. Please submit by DIO/Homelight; no buyer letters, please.
Directions to Property: E on High; u turn on Steele; R on Bayo; E on Mayb

3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Jennie A. Flanigan - Cell: 510-610-3601 - Sanctuary! This airy, inviting, large home with a magical garden is a true tranquil oasis. Enter through arbored gate to flagstone pathway and a fully fenced yard, past the shady porch to an inviting coral door. Open-flow loop: foyer, living, kitchen, dining, family; glossy h/w floors. Living area soaked in natural light with large windows. Efficient kitchen makes cooking & cleanup fun: stone counters, white cabinets, s/s apps. Enjoy views of the park/hills from the kitchen, dining, and living rooms. Retreat to the bed wing: Bath (shower/tub, vanity lav); all 3 upstairs BRs with garden views & wide closets; primary suite with glass doors to deck and backyard, bath (walk-in shower, vanity). The bountiful garden contains 23+ mature fruit trees/shrubs, planting beds, chicken coop, and rock terracing. A true urban gardening dream! Entertain or just unwind on the new lawn, playhouse, and crushed granite patio (for a pool, trampoline, or seating area) while enjoying the gorgeous hillside views. The 2 car garage includes laundry, workshop/storage, door to lower unit. Downstairs suite has wonderful light, studio bedroom, bath (mirror wall, pedestal sink, step-in shower), and eat-in kitchen. All this and only minutes from amenities, parks, hwys 13/580, and Redwood Heights Elementary!

SUNs 7/16 & 7/23, 2-4:30. Broker’s Tour: Monday 7/17, 10-1. OFFER DATE Wednesday 7/26 at noon. No pre-emptive offers please.  PLEASE call Jennie 510-610-3601 with any questions. 3rd Party Synd. Remarks: Kevin Skipper - 510-827-0327 - This classic Oakland split-level mid-century modern charmer is turn key and ready for living. Rich hardwood floors, bright light-filled rooms. and tucked in privacy offers a rare opportunity to settle down in this much desired Upper Laurel District enclave. A quad of stainless steel appliances, stone countertops, and fresh cabinetry round out the efficient remodeled kitchen. While the spacious living & formal dining rooms are ready for entertainment. New bathrooms are bright & airy and feature marble finishes. The surprisingly large light-filled bedrooms are luxurious & inviting. Mature drought resistant landscaping is easy and cost efficient to maintain. The backyard is fully fenced in and offers a covered pergola for outdoor entertaining or quiet contemplation. Easy access to HWYs 580 and 13 offer quick access to commute and entertainment options.  Minutes to OAK & SFO, downtown Oakland, SF Financial District, and southbound to Silicon Valley. Welcome home!
Confidential Remarks: Go and Show. Property to be sold in As-Is condition.
